choices.name: I_need_assistance_with_this_bulky_collection
choices.choiceText: I need assistance with this bulky collection

choices.name: No_I_want_to_cancel_this_bulky_collection
choices.choiceText: No, I want to cancel this bulky collection

choices.name: Yes_I_confirm_my_bulky_collection_and_pay_for_the_service
choices.choiceText: Yes, I confirm my bulky collection and payment for the service

fields.name: Assistedinfo
fields.fieldText:
If you are unable to move the items out of your property due to a medical condition, disability or other reason then you will need to select an ‘assisted collection’
For an assisted collection you will also be asked to complete a disclaimer form before the collection takes place.

fields.name: Do_you_require_an_assisted_collection
fields.fieldText: Do you require an assisted collection?

fields.name: BenefitsText
fields.fieldText: If you receive Council Tax or Housing Benefit then you can receive up to two free collections each year.

fields.name: Are_you_receipt_of_benefits
fields.fieldText: Are you receipt of benefits?

fields.name: benefitsenedtext
fields.fieldText: Please check if the caller is receiving benefits and if so proceed.Those receiving benefit will be able to have two bulky collections per year.

fields.name: info
fields.fieldText: Please enter details of your bulky collection. We can pick up most large items including Sofas, Ovens etc.

fields.name: noswappingText
fields.fieldText: Please note that items cannot be swapped unless you have contacted us first.

fields.name: Item_1_Text
fields.fieldText: Item 1

fields.name: Item_2_Text
fields.fieldText: Item 2

fields.name: Item_3_Text
fields.fieldText: Item 3

fields.name: Item_4_Text
fields.fieldText: Item 4

fields.name: Additional_Information_1
fields.fieldText: Any other additonal information:

fields.name: Please_confirm_where_you_will_leave_your_items
fields.fieldText: Please confirm where you will leave your items:

fields.name: wherelefttext
fields.fieldText: It is important that we have access to the area where you are leaving the bulky collection. For instance where the items are in a rear garden the gates must be unlocked and accessible.

fields.name: Additional_Information
fields.fieldText: Additional Information:

fields.name: introduction
fields.fieldText: The following dates are available for you to book your bulky collection. Please select your preferred date.

fields.name: bulkytext
fields.fieldText: Please leave all items out by 7am on the Monday. We endeavour to collect all items on Monday but in the event that that this is not possible please leave the items outside and we will collect them on Tuesday.

fields.name: end_text
fields.fieldText: Your Case Reference is shown below:

fields.name: caserreftest
fields.fieldText: {!textCaseNumber}

fields.name: bulkytext_0
fields.fieldText: Please now take payment via normal processes. Please include the casenumber as a payment reference.

fields.name: end_text_0
fields.fieldText: Your Case Reference is shown below:

fields.name: caserreftest_0
fields.fieldText: {!textCaseNumber}

fields.name: bulkytext_1
fields.fieldText: A member of the waste team will contact you to arrange your assisted collection.

fields.name: end_text_1
fields.fieldText: Your Case Reference is shown below:

fields.name: caserreftest_1
fields.fieldText: {!textCaseNumber}

fields.name: nodatestext
fields.fieldText: Sorry we cannot meet your required date - please try again closer to the date, or try again with existing dates (by pressing 'Previous')

fields.name: endText
fields.fieldText: The bulky waste collection is cancelled, please press 'Next'.

fields.name: FinalConfirmation
fields.fieldText:
The cost for this service is £30. Please confirm that you are ready to proceed.
You will need to pay or this service when you return to the main MyAccount screen.

fields.name: Confirmation
fields.fieldText: Confirmation

fields.name: introtext
fields.fieldText:
Please remember that any items containing glass must be wrapped in an old blanket or something similar.​
We are unable to collect the following items:
- Garden waste
- Soil, bricks, concrete or rubble ​
- Tyres and car parts​
- Cast iron boilers or baths​
- Pianos​
- Greenhouses​
- Gas bottles​
- Garage doors and window frames​
- Oil tanks​
- Asbestos​
- Large sheds (bigger than 8ft x 6ft)​

fields.name: bulkycollectioncosts
fields.fieldText:
Bulky Collection Costs - If you receive Council Tax or Housing Benefit then you can receive up to two free collections each year.
- If you are not in receipt of these benefits then there is a charge of £30 for up to four items.

fields.name: View_Available_Dates_First
fields.fieldText: View Available Dates First

fields.name: Confirm
fields.fieldText: Please confirm that you have read and understood this

fields.name: introtextondates
fields.fieldText: Please see below for potential available dates.
